TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPendingWork

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 提供参与工作批次的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to participate in a work batch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 提供 接口，以供要参与工作流运行时引擎批处理机制的服务使用。The interface is provided for services that want to participate in the workflow runtime engine batching mechanism. 批处理机制对于使用持久存储区的服务特别有用。The batching mechanism is especially useful for services that use a durable store. 在这些情况下，批处理机制对于在服务使用的持久存储区和工作流运行时引擎的内部状态之间保持一致十分重要。It is often important in these cases to maintain consistency between the durable store used by the service and the internal state of the workflow runtime engine. 如果您希望您的服务参与由 提供的工作流事务批处理，则必须实现由 接口定义的方法。If you want your service to participate in workflow transaction batching provided by the , you must implement the methods defined by the interface. 工作流运行时引擎将对您的服务调用 方法以提交该批次。The workflow runtime engine will call the method on your service to commit the batch. 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Commit (System.Transactions.Transaction transaction, System.Collections.ICollection items);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction, class System.Collections.ICollection items) cil managed
Public Sub Commit (transaction As Transaction, items As ICollection)
public: void Commit(System::Transactions::Transaction ^ transaction, System::Collections::ICollection ^ items);
abstract member Commit : System.Transactions.Transaction * System.Collections.ICollection -> unit

span.span: The associated with the pending work.
The work items to be committed.

summary.span: 使用指定的 对象提交工作项的列表。

span.span: Commits the list of work items by using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当工作流运行时引擎的语义指示应提交工作批次中的挂起工作时，工作流运行时引擎将调用 方法。The workflow runtime engine calls the method when its semantics dictate that the pending work in the work batch should be committed. 到达提交点时，工作流运行时引擎将在其工作批次中的每个 对象上调用 方法；工作流运行时引擎将在 方法中传递与该 对象关联的项的集合。When it reaches a commit point, the workflow runtime engine calls the method on each object in its work batch; the workflow runtime engine passes the method the collection of items associated with that object. 批次中的所有工作要么都成功，要么都不成功。Either all of the work in a batch succeeds or none of it succeeds. 当无法提交已传递到实现中的 方法的任何工作项时，您应该引发异常。You should throw an exception if any of the work items passed to the method in your implementation cannot be committed. 当无法提交 方法的工作项时，您可以根据实现在该方法中执行适当的回滚。Depending on your implementation, you may want to perform some rollback in your method if it cannot commit its work items. 成功提交工作批次中的所有工作时，工作流运行时引擎会将 参数设置为 `succeeded`，并调用 `true`；否则，它会将 设置为 `succeeded`，并调用 `false`。If the workflow runtime engine successfully commits all of the work in the work batch, it calls with the `succeeded` parameter set to `true`; otherwise, it calls with `succeeded` set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Complete (bool succeeded, System.Collections.ICollection items);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete(bool succeeded, class System.Collections.ICollection items) cil managed
Public Sub Complete (succeeded As Boolean, items As ICollection)
public: void Complete(bool succeeded, System::Collections::ICollection ^ items);
abstract member Complete : bool * System.Collections.ICollection -> unit

span.span: Called when the transaction has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `succeeded` 为 `true`，则事务成功，并且可以释放工作批次所使用的任何资源。If `succeeded` is `true`, the transaction succeeded and any resources used by the work batch may be released. 如果 `succeeded` 为 `false`，则事务失败。If `succeeded` is `false`, the transaction failed. 当事务失败时，你可以根据实现对工作批次中的工作执行任何适当的回滚。Depending on your implementation, you can perform any appropriate roll back on the work in the work batch when the transaction fails.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MustCommit(class System.Collections.ICollection items) cil managed
Public Function MustCommit (items As ICollection) As Boolean

summary.span: 允许工作批次中的项断言它们是否必须立即提交。

span.span: Allows the items in the work batch to assert whether they must commit immediately.

returns.span: 如果必须立即提交集合中的任一项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if any item in the collection must be committed immediately; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 返回 `false`，则可将工作推迟到一个将来的提交点。If returns `false`, the work can be postponed to a future commit point. 如果必须提交任一项，则返回 `true`，并且将在当前提交点提交所有项。If any of the items must be committed, then return `true` and all items will be committed at the current commit point. 有关可能的提交点的讨论，请参见 类。For a discussion about possible commit points, see the class.
